document.full_text: a pakistani journalist who went missing two days ago from the capital islamabad was found dead in eastern pakistan, police said on tuesday, in a case likely to revive debate about the freedom of the press in the country.
document.title: missing pakistani journalist found dead: police
lines_and_colors: a pakistani journalist who went missing two days ago from the capital islamabad was found dead in eastern pakistan, police said on tuesday, in a case likely to revive debate about the freedom of the press in the country.
